Description: back pay award in unfair labor practices case
Info Source: Extracted from an NLRB dataset covering 1999-2011 downloaded at https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/nlrb-cats-final-c-case-data-bulk-19990101-20110930-in-xml

Private Litigation Case Title: Dinkins et al v. YP Advertising LP et al
Justin Lefevre v. Pacific Bell Directory et al
O'Donnell et al v. Southwestern Bell Yellow Pages, Inc.
Tankersley et al v. Ameritech Publishing, Inc
In re R.H. Donnelley ERISA Litigation

Description: YP.com and affiliate Telco Billing, Inc. agreed to pay restitution to businesses and nonprofit groups in 34 states under a $2 million-plus settlement that resolved allegations YP deceptively marketed enhanced advertising in its Internet yellow pages directory.
